document.docAuthor: Yunakov, Nikolai, Nazarenko, Vitalij, Filimonov, Rostislav & Volovnik, Semyon
document.masterDocTitle: A survey of the weevils of Ukraine (Coleoptera: Curculionoidea)

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: A survey of the weevils of Ukraine (Coleoptera: Curculionoidea)

subSubSection.paragraph: Distribution. Palaearctic (excluding North Africa) ( Barrios & Korotyaev 2013 )

Biology. Forests, gardens, parks, shrublands. Adults occur in V–VI. On Rosaceae :
Malus communis
,
Armeniaca vulgaris
,
Cydonia oblonga
;
Cerasus padus
,
Prunus domestica
,
P. spinosa
,
Crataegus
spp. ( Barrios 1986 )
